means: 美远志，美远志根（可提取祛痰剂）

word_mean: ［拉］美远志：远志科美远志(Polygala senega L.)的干燥根茎。系产于北美的一种植物，其主要成分有远志酸和美远志皂甙元，可用作祛痰药及催吐药，在兽医上现已用于祛痰

means.word_mean: 1. dried root of two plants of the genus Polygala containing an irritating saponin
2. perennial bushy herb of Central and southern United States having white flowers with green centers and often purple crest; similar to Seneca snakeroot
